subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Hawks’ Craig Claxton, a Hofstra alum, saw his No. 10 retired at a halftime ceremony, just before V.C.U. retired his alma mater.
snippet: The Atlanta Hawks’ Craig Claxton, a Hofstra alum, saw his No. 10 retired at a halftime ceremony, just before V.C.U. retired his alma mater.
